attachments.title: Performance is User Experience | Designing for Performance
attachments.text: Web performance is a huge part of the user experience and should be weighed equally with the aesthetics of your site. Learn more in this chapter of Designing for Performance.
attachments.fallback: Performance is User Experience | Designing for Performance

text: <@U0914MEN7> Would love to see how this type of ~detail~ thinking can be incorporated into our project workflows. Happy to chat if you have any questions.

yes, <@U02618EV1>! I’m a huge believer that almost everybody on a project team makes decisions every day that impacts the user experience in a meaningful way - and this is but one example! :simple_smile:
will put some thought into how this can be woven in… but mostly, I’d say that each person just needs to keep these conversations alive.
